Showcases.name: Showcase #1: Quest of Banana (RPG Version)
Showcases.About: This ROBLOX game is an RPG game, based on the original Quest of Banana story game. It is mainly influenced by Paper Mario and other RPG games. However, I stopped working on this project to focus on other projects. Below shows the unfinished Battle System, along with the Inventory and Backpack System, and the Quest and Dialogue System.
ComponentsList: Battle System with Advanced Mechanics and Visuals
Advanced Inventory System
Advanced Quest and Dialogue System

Showcases.name: Showcase #2: Big Brain Returns!
Showcases.About: This ROBLOX game is a story-based game, where you fight a Big Brained Boss. It has multiple stages, and has great replayability.
ComponentsList: Advanced Quest and Dialogue System
Boss Fight with Multiple Stages

Showcases.name: Showcase #3: Spinner Tower Game
Showcases.About: Created in a one day Game-Jam, this is a round-based game where you must survive a giant spinner with random events.
ComponentsList: Advanced Voting and Round-Based System
Basic Shop System

Showcases.name: Showcase #4: Rebirth Story Game
Showcases.About: An older version of the previous Big Brain Returns game, this is a story-based game where you fight a Big Brained Boss. It has multiple stages, and has great replayability.
ComponentsList: Advanced Quest and Dialogue System
Boss Fight with a Stage

Showcases.name: Showcase #5: Duck Simulator Game (Work in Progress)
Showcases.About: Based on Bee Swarm Simulator, duck harvest seeds to create eggs. This is a very early stage of the game.
ComponentsList: Very Advanced Duck AI System

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #1: Troll Tower Game
CommissionWork.About: This is a ROBLOX game template made for a client. A troll tower consists of a large obstical course, with many traps and troll elements.
ComponentsList: Montesation Elements to Help Client Earn Robux
Advanced Leaderboard System
Advanced Reward System for people playing the game, extending monetization

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #2: Obby Game
CommissionWork.About: This is a ROBLOX game template made for a client. An Obby is a long obstacle course, with many different stages and challenges. We have made over 5 variants using this same template, and have this in our marketplace.
ComponentsList: Easy Template to make over 10+ Games
Advanced monetization System
Advanced Reward System for people playing the game, extending Monetization
Advanced Rebirth System
Advanced Shop System

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #3: Glass Bridge Game
CommissionWork.About: Based on Squid Game, we created the classic Bridge game on Roblox. This advanced template consists of players picking random glass tiles, trying to cross the area and win.
ComponentsList: Easy Template to make over 3+ Games
Advanced monetization System
Pet System
Easy to sell once the theme is overused

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #4: Cartride Game
CommissionWork.About: Made for clients and for templates. Classic type of genre on roblox, where you ride a cart to the finish line, and beware of other players.
ComponentsList: Easy Template to make over 4+ Games
Advanced monetization System
Advanced Cart System
Advanced Reward System for people playing the game, extending Monetization

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #5: Advanced Plugin For All Games (Work In Progress)
CommissionWork.About: Made for clients and for templates. Roblox has in-studio plugins, which can help developers make games faster. This is an advanced plugin that automatically finds which game you own out of our library, and automatically displays settings visually for starting developers.
ComponentsList: Easy for starting Developers to advance their experience with our templates
Very simple visuals and easy to use
Niche as a roblox plugin

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #6: Roblox Building Game (Work In Progress)
CommissionWork.About: Roblox Building games usually consist of placing minecraft-like blocks, and building structures. This is an advanced template that has many features, such as saving buildings, and a large variety of blocks.
ComponentsList: Easy Template to make over 2+ Games
Advanced Block System (Rotating, Advanced Camera Controls)
Advanced Reward System for people playing the game, extending Monetization

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #7: Advanced Promo-code System
CommissionWork.About: Roblox games have promo-codes, which can be used to give players free items or currency. This is an advanced promo-code system that allows developers to create and manage promo-codes easily.
ComponentsList: Easy System to make over 20+ Games
Advanced Reward System for people playing the game, extending Monetization

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #8: Advanced Daily Rewards System
CommissionWork.About: Roblox games have daily rewards to keep retention in games. This helps developers keep players coming back. This is an advanced daily rewards system that allows developers to create and manage daily rewards easily.
ComponentsList: Easy System to make over 20+ Games
Advanced Reward System for people playing the game, extending Monetization

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #9: Advanced Wheel Rewards System
CommissionWork.About: Roblox games have wheels for players to get random rewards from. Helps with retention and monetization. This is an advanced wheel system that allows developers to create and manage wheels easily.
ComponentsList: Easy System to make over 20+ Games
Advanced Reward System for people playing the game, extending Monetization

CommissionWork.name: Showcase #10: Bridge Game
CommissionWork.About: This theme is based on a genre at the time, where people would build a bridge with blocks, and fill the empty gap. When making money by placing blocks, you can upgrade your blocks to make more money. The goal is to reach the end of the bridge, and fight a boss.
ComponentsList: Easy Template to make over 4+ Games
Advanced Auto Build/Stacking System
Advanced Minion System
Advanced Boss-Fight System
Advanced Reward System for people playing the game, extending Monetization

RoboticsShowcase.name: Robotics Club Sandwich Robot (Robotics Club)
RoboticsShowcase.About: Made in robotics club, this robot is made to move sandwiches. With a limited time in the year, we were only able to finish the moving cart, but this year we will add the scissor lift.
ComponentsList: Uses Four Motors and a RPI-4 to Move
3D Modeled each comonent: Divided into four parts
Uses a 12V Battery to Power the Robot
